column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I woke up with a craving for their coffee
column2: let's start there. The aroma is mouth watering and the macaroons line up for ig perfection. Although the line can be intimidating
column3: the staff keeps it moving smoothly. The tables are cleaned regularly so you are not sitting around other people's crumbs
column4: which is the case a lot of the times at other bakeries. Contemplating getting up now to get a latte.
